Prioritaskan Prestasi, Iwan Bule Akan Bayar Kompensasi Kontrak Simon McMenemy
06 Nov 2019, 17:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI akan membayar kompensasi pemutusan kontrak Simon McMenemy dari kursi pelatih Timnas Indonesia. Pasalnya, arsitek asal Skotlandia itu masih terikat kerja sama sampai Desember 2020.
Per hari ini, Kamis (6/11/2019), PSSI telah memberhentikan Simon sebagai pelatih Timnas Indonesia. Tapi, nakhoda tim berusia 41 tahun itu diharapkan masih menangani Evan Dimas dan kawan-kawan ketika menghadapi Malaysia.
Timnas Indonesia akan menantang Malaysia pada partai keempat Grup G Kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2022 Zona Asia.Duel kedua negara bakal berlangsung di Stadion Nasional Bukit Jalil, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, pada 19 November mendatang.
"Ya itu resiko kami memberikan kompensasi. Memang aturannya begitu," ujar Ketua Umum PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta.
"Pilih prestasi apa uang? Kami tentunya lebih memilih prestasi. Karena, maaf, kalau uang bisa dicari."
"Jadi, prestasi ini kami kejar. Ini nama baik Indonesia. Ini pertaruhan nama dan bangsa Indonesia. Itu resiko kami. Karena ada aturan dalam kontrak tersebut harus kami tindak lanjuti," katanya menambahkan.

Prioritizing Achievement, Iwan Bule Will Pay for Simon McMenemy's Contract Compensation
Nov 6 2019, 17:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI will pay compensation for the termination of the contract Simon McMenemy from the Indonesian national team coach seat. Because the Scottish architect was still bound by cooperation until December 2020.
As of today, Thursday (11/06/2019), PSSI has dismissed Simon as the Indonesian national team coach. But, the 41-year-old team captain is expected to still handle Evan Dimas and his friends when facing Malaysia.
The Indonesian national team will challenge Malaysia in the fourth group of Group G in the 2022 World Cup Qualification Zone Asia. The duel between the two countries will take place at the Bukit Jalil National Stadium, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, on November 19th.
"Yes, we risk giving compensation. Indeed, the rules are like that," said Chairman of PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta.
"Choose what achievement is money? We certainly prefer achievement. Because, sorry, if money can be sought."
"So, we are pursuing this achievement. This is the good name of Indonesia. This is a gamble on the name and the Indonesian nation. That is our risk. Because there are rules in the contract we must follow up," he added.
